mapper.select: WITH ranked AS ( SELECT SIDO_NM, SIGNGU_NM, OBSR_VALUE AS OBSR_VALUE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY SIDO_NM, SIGNGU_NM, TRIM(UPPER(CATEGORY)) ORDER BY BASE_DATE DESC, TO_NUMBER(LPAD(TRIM(BASE_TIME), 4, '0')) DESC, NOWCAST_NO DESC ) AS RN FROM NOWCAST WHERE TRIM(UPPER(CATEGORY)) = TRIM(UPPER(#{category})) ) SELECT SIDO_NM, SIGNGU_NM, OBSR_VALUE FROM ranked WHERE RN = 1 ORDER BY SIDO_NM, SIGNGU_NM

WITH base AS ( SELECT NOWCAST_NO, BASE_DATE, BASE_TIME, SIDO_NM, SIGNGU_NM, NX, NY, /* 정규화된 카테고리 */ CASE WHEN TRIM(UPPER(CATEGORY)) IN ('PCP','PRCP','RAIN','R1H','RAIN1H') THEN 'RN1' ELSE TRIM(UPPER(CATEGORY)) END AS CAT, OBSR_VALUE, ( BASE_DATE + NUMTODSINTERVAL(SUBSTR(BASE_TIME,1,2), 'HOUR') + NUMTODSINTERVAL(SUBSTR(BASE_TIME,3,2), 'MINUTE') ) AS TS FROM NOWCAST WHERE TRIM(UPPER(CATEGORY)) IN ('T1H','RN1','REH','WSD','PCP','PRCP','RAIN','R1H','RAIN1H') ), latest AS ( SELECT NOWCAST_NO, BASE_DATE, BASE_TIME, SIDO_NM, SIGNGU_NM, NX, NY, CAT, OBSR_VALUE, TS, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY SIDO_NM, SIGNGU_NM, CAT ORDER BY TS DESC ) rn FROM base ), regions AS (SELECT DISTINCT SIDO_NM, SIGNGU_NM FROM NOWCAST), cats AS ( SELECT 'T1H' AS CAT FROM dual UNION ALL SELECT 'RN1' FROM dual UNION ALL SELECT 'REH' FROM dual UNION ALL SELECT 'WSD' FROM dual ) SELECT r.SIDO_NM AS SIDO_NM, r.SIGNGU_NM AS SIGNGU_NM, c.CAT AS CATEGORY, NVL(l.NOWCAST_NO, 0) AS NOWCAST_NO, CASE WHEN l.BASE_DATE IS NOT NULL THEN TO_CHAR(l.BASE_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') ELSE NULL END AS BASE_DATE, l.BASE_TIME AS BASE_TIME, NVL(l.NX,0) AS NX, NVL(l.NY,0) AS NY, /* RN1만 NULL→0 보정 */ CASE WHEN c.CAT='RN1' THEN NVL(l.OBSR_VALUE,0) ELSE l.OBSR_VALUE END AS OBSR_VALUE FROM regions r CROSS JOIN cats c LEFT JOIN latest l ON l.rn = 1 AND l.SIDO_NM = r.SIDO_NM AND l.SIGNGU_NM = r.SIGNGU_NM AND l.CAT = c.CAT ORDER BY r.SIDO_NM, r.SIGNGU_NM, c.CAT

WITH base AS ( SELECT NOWCAST_NO, BASE_DATE, BASE_TIME, SIDO_NM, SIGNGU_NM, NX, NY, CATEGORY, OBSR_VALUE, ( BASE_DATE + NUMTODSINTERVAL(SUBSTR(BASE_TIME,1,2), 'HOUR') + NUMTODSINTERVAL(SUBSTR(BASE_TIME,3,2), 'MINUTE') ) AS TS FROM NOWCAST WHERE TRIM(UPPER(CATEGORY)) IN ('T1H','RN1','REH','WSD') AND TRIM(SIDO_NM) = #{sidoNm} AND ( /* 완전 일치 (공백 무시) */ REPLACE(TRIM(SIGNGU_NM),' ','') = REPLACE(TRIM(#{signguNm}),' ','') OR /* 마지막 토큰 일치: '포항시 북구' → '북구' */ REPLACE(TRIM(SIGNGU_NM),' ','') = REPLACE(TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR(#{signguNm},'[^ ]+$')),' ','') OR /* DB가 '포항시북구' / 파라미터가 '북구' 같은 경우 */ REPLACE(TRIM(SIGNGU_NM),' ','') LIKE REPLACE(TRIM(#{signguNm}),' ','') || '%' OR /* 반대 케이스: 파라미터가 더 길 때 */ REPLACE(TRIM(#{signguNm}),' ','') LIKE REPLACE(TRIM(SIGNGU_NM),' ','') || '%' ) ), latest AS ( SELECT NOWCAST_NO, BASE_DATE, BASE_TIME, SIDO_NM, SIGNGU_NM, NX, NY, CATEGORY, OBSR_VALUE, TS, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY SIDO_NM, SIGNGU_NM, CATEGORY ORDER BY TS DESC ) rn FROM base ), cats AS ( SELECT 'T1H' AS CATEGORY FROM dual UNION ALL SELECT 'RN1' FROM dual UNION ALL SELECT 'REH' FROM dual UNION ALL SELECT 'WSD' FROM dual ) SELECT #{sidoNm} AS SIDO_NM, #{signguNm} AS SIGNGU_NM, c.CATEGORY AS CATEGORY, NVL(l.NOWCAST_NO, 0) AS NOWCAST_NO, CASE WHEN l.BASE_DATE IS NOT NULL THEN TO_CHAR(l.BASE_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') ELSE NULL END AS BASE_DATE, l.BASE_TIME AS BASE_TIME, NVL(l.NX,0) AS NX, NVL(l.NY,0) AS NY, NVL(l.OBSR_VALUE,0) AS OBSR_VALUE FROM cats c LEFT JOIN latest l ON l.rn = 1 AND l.CATEGORY = c.CATEGORY ORDER BY c.CATEGORY
